basic.description: The subtitle of this course is 'Civilizations and Empires in Asia and Africa: The Evolution and Dissolution of the 'Third World' from 1500-2005.' This course discusses civilizations and empires from Antiquity to the Modern Age, European Imperialism and Colonialism from 1500-1945; Asia and Africa from 1945-2005.
basic.subject: HIST
basic.title: The Making of the Third World I
